name: BOT vs BOT
description:
Disclaimer*: This game is not currently in development, although the developers may consider to continue development if a foreseeable fan base falls from the sky.  What exists now is perfectly playable in a Free For All format, although some bugs may rear their ugly heads.  The developers enjoy playing this game in its current state and therefore decided to offer it for free for others to equally enjoy.  If you enjoy this game please leave a comment in the comment section and if you are generous kindly donate.  Thanks for trying it out, we hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

Regards,
Daryl and Craig  Tri-Coastal Games

Oculus Rift and Oculus Quest with Link are the only supported devices at this time.
